name: fluent
description: Learn languages naturally while browsing - Chrome extension

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production vite build --mode production && NODE_ENV=production vite build -c vite.content.config.ts --mode production && NODE_ENV=production vite build -c vite.background.config.ts --mode production
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../fluent.zip . && cd ..
scripts.package:dev: npm run build:dev && cd dist && zip -r ../fluent-dev.zip . && cd ..
scripts.check: npm run type-check && npm run build && npm run pre-publish
